message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: // Assuming obj is your JSONObject
Iterator<String> iter = obj.keys();
while (iter.hasNext()) {
    String key = iter.next();
    JSONArray values = obj.getJSONArray(key);
    for (int i = 0; i < values.length(); i++) {
        String value = values.getString(i);
        System.out.println("Value is --> " + value);
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: In your code, you are trying to access the JSONArray using the key directly, which is incorrect. You need to use the key to get the JSONArray from the JSONObject, and then iterate over the values in the JSONArray to extract the desired values.
